title: Introduction to Qubits
description: Learn what a qubit is and how it behaves.

title: Quantum Gates
description: Understand basic quantum gates like X, H, and Z.
content:
A **Hadamard gate** applies the following transformation:

$$
H = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 1 \\ 1 & -1 \end{bmatrix}
$$
